articles.description: Juniper Networks addresses a major 9.8-rated RCE vulnerability in SRX Series firewalls & EX Series switches.
articles.content:
Juniper Networks has released updates to fix a critical remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability in its SRX Series firewalls and EX Series switches.
The issue, tracked as CVE-2024-21591, is rated 9… [+1890 chars]
